content: First, these additional class starts to double BSN pre-licensure cohorts at our main Phoenix campus, meaning that every semester, a total of 3 cohorts enter the core program across our 2 Phoenix campuses; second, the continued expansion of the USU business unit driven by our successful FNP program; third, and the most powerful lever of Aspen Group's future growth is enrollment growth at our new BSN pre-licensure campuses that deliver the highest LTV of all of our programs and have significant potential operating leverage.
